short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change playback speed of YouTube videos from 0.0625x to 16x.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your YouTube viewing experience with our Chrome extension that lets you control the playback speed of videos. With a simple slider, you can set speeds anywhere from 0.0625x for ultra-slow motion to 16x for a quick watch. Whether you want to take your time understanding tutorials or speed through lengthy content, our extension puts you in charge. This user-friendly tool is designed for convenience, allowing you to adjust playback speed effortlessly. Slow down videos to catch every detail or speed them up for efficient watching. Download our extension now and take control of your YouTube experience by customizing playback speeds to suit your preferences.
